Extracted Variables:
- \( x \): number of basketballs produced
- \( y \): number of footballs produced

Extracted Constraints:
- Materials: \( 5x + 3y \leq 1500 \) (available materials constraint)
- Labor: \( x + 2y \leq 750 \) (maximum working hours constraint)
- MinimumBasketballs: \( x \geq 3y \) (at least three times as many basketballs as footballs)
- MinimumFootballs: \( y \geq 50 \) (at least 50 footballs)

Extracted Objective:
- Maximize \( Z = x + y \) (total number of sports equipment produced)
